content:
It's been a while since I've wrote my thoughts about him. Finally, I got his name! Natsuhiko! Such a cute nameee. kawaiii o(〃＾▽＾〃)o

He's a very hardworking person and kind as well! He's in a few club too. Sumii said that he plays the guitar in the music club. Sumii's friend said that he's also said he's in the human rights club and he's basically a shining beacon of hope! He's also in Hanzo's calisthenics club.

He has spoken to me a few times. He even asked about my button badges. ♪(^∇^*)

Mr. Hojaru and Mr. Ren have also been seeing each other a lot. I think someone said to Sumii that they've seen them kiss!
